configuration.note: All activation evaluations use Neuronpedia API. Activation threshold is dynamically calculated from top 10 high-activating API exemplars (average of max activations / 2). Generation Evaluation uses top 10 high-activating exemplars. Prediction Evaluation uses selected exemplars directly from API (excluding top 10), with activation values already available (no API calls needed for activations). model_name and sae_path are kept for record-keeping only and are not used for any calculations.

explanation.description: Feature 1403 (Layer 7) fires on specific subword morphemes found in (a) Germanic-origin surnames, especially those with We- + (-chsler/-tzel/-rtheimer) and related -ssler/-g(g)ins patterns, and (b) biomedical terms of the angioma/angioblastoma family (angi- ... -oma). In our tests, activations ranged from 0.000 to 3.031 (with prior corpus maxima up to 6.500 on “ler” in “Wechsler”), showing strong selectivity for these substrings and near-zero for unrelated or near-miss forms.
explanation.evidence:
- Test 13/24: "Wechsler scores/scored again." → 3.031 (supports Germanic surname morpheme selectivity; matches corpus max on “ler” in Wechsler)
- Test 25: "Wetzel was hired." → 2.609 (supports Germanic -tzel selectivity; aligns with exemplar Wetzel=2.922 on “zel”)
- Test 16/28: "Hemangioma was excised." → 2.281 (supports angi-...-oma biomedical selectivity; aligns with exemplars on hemangioblastoma/haemangioma)
- Test 30/7/19: "Wiggins dominated tonight." → 0.984 (partial support for -iggins; weaker than Wechsler/Wetzel)
- Test 14: "Wertheimer wrote a memo." → 0.871 (supports -heimer pattern; weaker but positive)
- Test 2: "Kessler scored again." → 0.711 (supports -ssler pattern; moderate activation)
- Test 1: "Schindler arrived late." → 0.146 (weak activation; indicates not all -ndler forms strongly trigger)
- Test 20/31: "Higgins spoke today." → 0.000 (contradicts broad -iggins generalization; suggests selectivity for Wiggins or specific segmentation)
- Test 4/17/27: "Angiogenesis was inhibited." → 0.000 (contradicts broad angi- generalization; indicates preference for angi-...-oma/angioblastoma forms, not angiogenesis)
- Test 6/18/29: "Angel arrived early." → 0.000 (negative near-miss; supports specificity against 'angi' vs 'angel')
- Tests 10/11/12/21/22/23/26/32/33/34/35: generic negatives (e.g., "She left for Paris.", "I bought it yesterday.", "Dogs bark at night.") → 0.000 (supports overall selectivity)

generated_examples: Professor Wechsler presented the results with quiet, deliberate confidence.
The patient was diagnosed with a cavernous hemangioma.
Wetzel signed the lease before the agent noticed.
Wertheimer argued the case persuasively before the appellate panel.
Biopsy confirmed an angiolipoma beneath the right scapula.
Radiology suggested lymphangioma, prompting a multidisciplinary consult.
Wessler declined the invitation, citing prior commitments.
Weissler curated the exhibit on early modern printmaking.
Pathology notes described an angiofibroma involving the nasopharynx.
Genetics discussed rare angioblastoma variants in pediatric cohorts.

detailed_results.example: Professor Wechsler presented the results with quiet, deliberate confidence.
The patient was diagnosed with a cavernous hemangioma.
Wetzel signed the lease before the agent noticed.
Wertheimer argued the case persuasively before the appellate panel.
Biopsy confirmed an angiolipoma beneath the right scapula.
Radiology suggested lymphangioma, prompting a multidisciplinary consult.
Wessler declined the invitation, citing prior commitments.
Weissler curated the exhibit on early modern printmaking.
Pathology notes described an angiofibroma involving the nasopharynx.
Genetics discussed rare angioblastoma variants in pediatric cohorts.

explanation.description: proper names, especially surname-like tokens within names and name-based terms.
proper names, especially surname-like tokens within names and name-based terms.

generated_examples: Dr. Priya Patel consulted with Professor Nguyen on Thursday.
Invited speakers include Maria García-López, Hans van der Meer.
The Smiths and the Johnsons shared adjacent cabins last summer.
Signed, Jonathan O'Connor, Esq., attorney for Ms. Rodriguez.
Our captain, LeBron James, passed to Anthony Davis for three.
She kept comparing us to the Joneses during renovations.
A Freudian slip betrayed his nervousness on stage.
Wedding program: Alex Chen and Morgan Rivera-Smith, Saturday evening.
Investor call featured Johnson & Johnson and Goldman Sachs analysts.
Her lab follows Newtonian mechanics and praises Einstein's insights.

prediction_evaluation.note: Prediction Evaluation uses selected exemplars directly from API (excluding top 10 used for Generation Evaluation). Exemplars are categorized into high, medium, and low activation groups from remaining exemplars, and randomly selected from each group. Activation values are already available from exemplars, so no API calls are needed to get activations. This avoids bias from explanation text and ensures diverse activation levels in evaluation examples.
